### promoteAllocaUserToVector() {#aff60d107b0bf41de42918c5bf046d8c3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; promoteAllocaUserToVector (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Inst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp; DL, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> &#42; VectorTy, unsigned VecStoreSize, unsigned ElementSize, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memtransferinst">MemTransferInst</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/structs/memtransferinfo">MemTransferInfo</a> &gt; &amp; TransferInfo, std::map&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/getelementptrinst">GetElementPtrInst</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; GEPVectorIdx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; CurVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; DeferredLoads)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Promotes a single user of the alloca to a vector form.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Inst"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> to be promoted.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="DL"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> Data Layout.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="VectorTy">Vectorized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="VecStoreSize">Size of <code>VectorTy</code> in bytes.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="ElementSize">Size of <code>VectorTy</code> element type in bytes.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="TransferInfo"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memtransferinst">MemTransferInst</a> info map.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="GEPVectorIdx">GEP -&gt; VectorIdx cache.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="CurVal">Current value of the vector (e.g. last stored value)</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="[out] DeferredLoads"><code>Inst</code> is added to this vector if it can&#39;t be promoted now. This happens when promoting requires <code>CurVal</code>, but <code>CurVal</code> is nullptr.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the stored value if <code>Inst</code> would have written to the alloca, or nullptr otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="#l00448">448</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpupromotealloca-cpp">AMDGPUPromoteAlloca.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them to local address space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Two passes are exposed by this file:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    - &quot;promote-alloca-to-vector&quot;, which runs early in the pipeline and only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      promotes to vector. Promotion to vector is almost always profitable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      except when the alloca is too big and the promotion would result in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      very high register pressure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    - &quot;promote-alloca&quot;, which does both promotion to vector and LDS and runs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      much later in the pipeline. This runs after SROA because promoting to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      LDS is of course less profitable than getting rid of the alloca or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      vectorizing it, thus we only want to do it when the only alternative is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      lowering the alloca to stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that both of them exist for the old and new PMs. The new PM passes are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// declared in AMDGPU.h and the legacy PM ones are declared here.s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A non-entry function has only 32 caller preserved registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not promote alloca which will force spilling unless we know the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be inlined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.hasFnAttribute(Attribute::AlwaysInline) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a3c65c76a817d60e322ff750366674a92">AMDGPU::isEntryFunctionCC</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getCallingConv()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxVGPRs = std::min(MaxVGPRs, 32u);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Increment score by one for each user + a bonus for users within loops.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Score += UserScore;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we want to cast to cast, e.g. a &lt;2 x ptr&gt; into a &lt;4 x i32&gt;, we need to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> % NumPtrElts == 0) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Vector size not divisble&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;EltTy = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a31e2db8d1b315202d2c19e711b5365fd">getIntNTy</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> / NumPtrElts);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Examples:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Iterates over an instruction worklist that may contain multiple instructions</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstContainer&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690" lineLink="#ab31875cec1c2cfccd8e59abdbe931f77"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ab31875cec1c2cfccd8e59abdbe931f77">forEachWorkListItem</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstContainer &amp;WorkList,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Function has a reference to externally allocated &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AllocatedSizes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a396fcfee6914c76974b73c3d203da6a5">emplace&#95;back</a>(AllocSize, Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort to try to estimate the worst case alignment padding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: We should really do something to fix the addresses to a more optimal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value instead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74cdbd1e4f731e7d7cd83461b8b1de0b">llvm::sort</a>(AllocatedSizes, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/less-second">llvm::less&#95;second</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check how much local memory is being used by global objects</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CurrentLocalMemUsage = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Try to account for padding here. The real padding and address is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// currently determined from the inverse order of uses in the function when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// legalizing, which could also potentially change. We try to estimate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// worst case here, but we probably should fix the addresses earlier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a264176188c0aadccd3ca5b6929b5a2e1aea571dc00aef155a16d4e7e1861e1682">Alloc</a> : AllocatedSizes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurrentLocalMemUsage = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(CurrentLocalMemUsage, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a264176188c0aadccd3ca5b6929b5a2e1aea571dc00aef155a16d4e7e1861e1682">Alloc</a>.second);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxOccupancy =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Restrict local memory usage so that we don&#39;t drastically reduce occupancy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unless it is already significantly reduced.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OccupancyHint = std::min(OccupancyHint, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>.getMaxWavesPerEU());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getName() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; uses &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; CurrentLocalMemUsage</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WorkGroupSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>.getFlatWorkGroupSizes(ContainingFunction).second;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getValueOrABITypeAlignment(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getAlign(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getAllocatedType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This computed padding is likely wrong since it depends on inverse</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// usage order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: It is also possible that if we&#39;re allowed to use all of the memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could end up using more than the maximum due to alignment padding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t NewSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(CurrentLocalMemUsage, Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t AllocSize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><span class="doxyHighlight">      WorkGroupSize &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeAllocSize(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getAllocatedType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NewSize += AllocSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewSize &gt; LocalMemLimit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; bytes of local memory not available to promote\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
